root.name: Deathkeep
root.description: An evil wizard plots to destroy the world. Summoned to by a magic amulet the hero must stop the wizard's plans for revenge. Playing as an Dwarf Fighter, Half-Elf Fighter/Mage or an Elf Mage the player must battle through three dungeons collecting seals to reach the evil wizard and put a stop to his fowl quest. A very limited interpretation of the 2nd Edition ADD ruleset is used.This was the final Dungeons Dragons game developed by SSI.
